scripts.vm:provision: multipass launch --name umbrel-dev --cpus 2 --memory 4G --disk 50G 23.10 && npm run vm:transfer && multipass exec umbrel-dev -- /opt/umbrel/scripts/provision-vm
scripts.vm:transfer: npm run vm:exec sudo mkdir -p /opt/umbrel; npm run vm:exec sudo chown ubuntu:ubuntu /opt/umbrel && multipass transfer --recursive $PWD/. umbrel-dev:/opt/umbrel
scripts.vm:umbreld: multipass exec umbrel-dev -- bash -c 'cd /opt/umbrel/packages/umbreld && sudo npm run start -- --data-directory /home/ubuntu/data --log-level verbose'
scripts.vm:ui: multipass exec umbrel-dev -- bash -c 'cd /opt/umbrel/packages/ui && sudo pnpm run dev'
